\section{Papers individuales}

\subsection{Show, Attend \& Tell \citep{xu2015attend}}

\subsection{Automatic Generation of Medical Imaging Reports \citep{baoyu_jing2018}}
\begin{itemize}
\item Image captioning with deep learning: \citep{vinyals2014tell}\citep{fang2014captions}\citep{karpathy2014deep}\citep{xu2015attend}\citep{krause2016hierarchical}\citep{you2016image}\citep{liang2017recurrent}
\item Hierarchical LSTM: \citep{krause2016hierarchical,liang2017recurrent}
\item Co-attention: \citep{ba2014multiple}\citep{xu2015attend}
\item Datasets: \citep{IUX-ray}
\item Metrics: BLEU\citep{papineni-etal-2002-bleu}, METEOR \citep{meteor},
ROUGE \citep{rouge}, CIDEr \citep{cider}
\item LSTM cannot effectively model long sequences: \citep{liu-etal-2015-multi}\citep{martin2018parallelizing}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Feature Difference Makes Sense \citep{park-etal-2020-feature-difference}}
\begin{itemize}
\item Image captioning with deep learning: \citep{vinyals2014tell,xu2015attend,karpathy2014deep,you2016image}\citep{zhou17-what-you-just-said}\citep{anderson2017bottomup}
\item X-ray datasets: \citep{kougia2019survey}\citep{johnson2019mimiccxrjpg}
\item Feature difference \citep{jhamtani2018learning}\citep{tan2019expressing}\citep{forbes2019neural}
\item Feature vectors from lower convolutional layers\citep{darlow2019what}\citep{bau2017network}\citep{zhou2017interpreting}
\end{itemize}
